events.message: I would like to request a refund for the jacket I purchased last week. It does not fit and I want my money back.
The reported issue has been categorized as a refund request based on the customer's message about returning the product.
An agent from the refunds department has been assigned to handle the customer's refund request.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us regarding your order. I'm here to help you with the refund process for the jacket you purchased.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the item has been used or damaged in any way?
The order number is 123456789. The jacket is in perfect condition but is just too small for me.
Thank you for the details. You can return the jacket using our prepaid shipping label, and we will process your refund once we receive the item.
That sounds great, thank you for making this easy. I will send it back today.
We have updated your case with the return instructions. Please ship the jacket and let us know if you need any further assistance.
We are following up to confirm if you have shipped the jacket and to remind you that we are here to assist with your refund.
Yes, I shipped the jacket yesterday via the prepaid label. Looking forward to receiving the refund soon.
Your refund has been processed and should appear in your bank account within 3-5 business days. Thank you for your patience.
We have sent a quick survey to gather your feedback on the refund experience. Your input is appreciated.
I completed the survey. Overall, I am very satisfied with how smoothly the refund process went. Thanks again!
The case has been closed following your positive feedback. Please contact us again if you need any further help in the future.
